name: Shucks
description:
Sneak around as a parasitic alien who made an unfortunately left turn onto planet Earth! Leap onto security guard's heads to ride them into secure areas and feed off their bodies. But be careful! When their heads explode they'll attract the attention of their fellow guards, who may well FREAK OUT!

Collect all the parts of your spaceship by riding security personnel and escape this horrible place!

Made in 8 hours in October 2013
